text.language: Afermeyre n~je Iwann/c: qen pif~tou n~euaggelion: je ai]wmc m~Pacwt/r: qen nimwou n~te Piiordan/c:
John the Baptist testified: in the four Gospels: saying “I baptized my Savior: in the waters of the Jordan”

language.div: Yohanes Pembaptis, telah bersaksi di dalam empat injil, berkata: Saya membaptis Juruselamatku, di dalam air Yordan.

text.language: شهد يوحنا فى الأربعة أناجيل إنى عمدت مخلصى فى مياه الأردن .
